catalog_info.title: Supervised Reading and Research
catalog_info.notes: Hours to be arranged Rebecca Toseland Does not count for concentration credit and may not be taken Pass/Fail. Requires signatures of the faculty adviser and an Economics Department Lecturer/Advisor. Application available at the Economics Undergraduate Office at Littauer Center, North Yard.
catalog_info.description: Supervised reading--by an economics faculty member--leading to a long term paper on a topic or topics not covered by regular courses.
